issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: dagw
assignee.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

fields.summary: RolesConferredPrivilegesTest  fails with  'java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java.sql.DriverManager'  with weme 6.1

author.name: olesolberg
author.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

comments.body:
I see this also on cvm:
phoneME Advanced (phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34)
Foundation Profile Specification 1.1
CVM phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34 (interpreter loop),

since svn r703509: http://dbtg.thresher.com/derby/test/Daily/javaME/testing/Limited/testSummary-703509.html

updateAuthor.name: olesolberg
updateAuthor.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

author.name: dagw
author.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

comments.body:
Uploading a patch to disable the parts of the test that needs DriverManager.
I haven't tested it on a small platform myself.

updateAuthor.name: dagw
updateAuthor.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

author.name: olesolberg
author.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

comments.body:
I run suitesAll with the patch on cvm: The

'testCurrentRoleInWeirdContexts(org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RolesConferredPrivilegesTest)java.sql.SQLException: The exception 'java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java.sql.DriverManager' was thrown while evaluating an expression.'

and

'testDefaultCurrentRole(org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RolesConferredPrivilegesTest)java.sql.SQLException: The exception 'java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java.sql.DriverManager' was thrown while evaluating an expression.'

failures do not occur anymore.

updateAuthor.name: olesolberg
updateAuthor.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

author.name: myrna
author.emailAddress: m dot v dot lunteren at gmail dot com

comments.body:
I got the same result with weme6.1 - with the patch there are no more NoClassDefFoundErrors.
+1 to commit.
